author: Staff Reporter
text:
Over 200 students studying Plus One and Plus Two in various schools in the city took part in a career guidance programme organised by The Hindu in School in association with GITAM University here on Saturday.

In the programme conducted at Mahatma Montessori School, K. Vijaya Bhaskar Raju, Director of GITAM School of Technology in Bengaluru, stressed the importance of verifying accreditation and ranking of a college before joining it since choosing a wrong institution could ruin one’s career. He spoke about various streams of engineering that provided better job opportunities and certain niche fields which could generate more jobs in near future.
title: Students get career guidance
